item.title: [rep++] simple questin - 317 tele in combat =o [rep++]
item.dc:creator: @Anc13nts253 Anc13nts253
item.description:
@Anc13nts253 wrote:

[quote=“Ace., post:1, topic:374272”]Ok, this sounds disgusting to ask, but teleporting in my source is bugged (sorta :/)

People can teleport in combat, even when clicking on spells in the magic book. I tried adding a method like the following:

if(!inCombat) {
c.triggertele(3000, 3000, 0);
break;

WARNING: THATS NOT THE EXACT CODE I JUST WROTE IT UP ON THE SPOT =O =O =O!

Remember, I will Rep++ the first person whom gives me the correct answer =o.

Thanks in advance (Y).[/quote]

Try something like this…

if player.inCombat()) { c.sendMessage("You can't teleport in combat"); return; c.triggertele(3000, 3000, 0); break;

I don’t know what base you have so I don’t know, or add my msn - Kmunoz789@hotmail.com for further assistance.

Read full topic
